R2Bees bụ onye Ghana hip hop na hiplife duo si Tema nke ụmụ nwanne nna abụọ, Faisal Hakeem na Rashid Mugeez mejupụtara
A họpụtara ha n'afọ 2013 BET Awards. Na Machị 2019, ha abụọ wepụtara abọm studio nke atọ ha bụ Site n'afọ iri na ise.
E wepụtara egwu mbụ nke R2BEES, "Yawa Gal", n'ọnwa Ọgọstụ afọ 2008
Ha wee gaa n'ihu wepụta "I Dey Mad", nke gosipụtara egwu Unda
Egwu a nọ n'elu ọtụtụ chaatị egwu redio nke Ghana ruo ọtụtụ izu
N'afọ 2010, R2Bees wepụtara "Kiss Your Hand" dị ka egwu nke atọ ha.

N'afọ 2009, R2Bees wepụtara abọm egwu iri na asaa Da Revolution nke ewepụtala egwu; 'Yawa Girl', I dey Mad', 'T.E.M.A', 'Kiss Your Hand' na egwu ọhụrụ; 'Radio'', 'One more Chance' na 'Africa' na mmepụta site na KillBeatz (Joseph Addison) yana ndị ọbịa si Wande Coal, Sarkodie, Samini, Kwaw Kese na ọtụtụ ndị ọzọ.
E wepụtara abọm studio nke abụọ ha, Refuse To Be Broke - Da Revolution II, na 29 Machị 2013
Abọm ahụ nwere ndị ọbịa sitere na Wizkid, Sherifa Gunu, Davido, Tinchy Stryder na Voicemail
Ọ bụ KillBeatz na-ahụ maka mmepụta abọm ahụ. R2Bees wepụtara egwu mbụ ha maka afọ 2014, "Lobi"
E wepụtara vidiyo egwu highlife na 25 Septemba 2014.
R2Bees na-abụkarị abụ ma na-eti egwu n'asụsụ obodo Twi na Pidgin
R2bees bụ otu n'ime ndị na-eweta ihe kachasị elu nke Ghanaian hip pop subgenre hiplife, nke na-agwakọta rap na ụda nke hi-life (egwu pop nke Africa) na reggae

N'afọ 2012, e gosipụtara R2Bees na ndepụta Forbes nke "ndị ama ama n'Afrịka ga-ekiri n'afọ 2013". R2Bees emeela n'otu ogbo ya na ndị egwu mba ụwa dịka ndị na-agụ egwu R&B nke America bụ Mario na J Holiday.
